metadata.title: CVE-2024-6197 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
freeing stack buffer in utf8asn1str

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-6197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.22
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.22
libcurl3-nss - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.22
libcurl4 - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.22
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.68.0-1ubuntu2.22').
